meanings.definition: To surpass in studying or learning.
meanings.sent1: She always outstudies her classmates by working hard.
meanings.sent2: He outstudies his friends by spending extra time on homework.
meanings.sent3: The student who outstudies everyone else wins the academic award.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to outstudies others shines brightly in her exam scores.
meanings.sent5: Outstudying the competition is her secret to success.

meanings.definition: To study more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: He outstudies his siblings to excel in school.
meanings.sent2: She outstudies her peers to achieve top grades.
meanings.sent3: The race to outstudy each other in the library is intense.
meanings.sent4: Outstudying his rivals, he secures a spot in the honor roll.
meanings.sent5: Outstudying is his strategy to stay ahead in academics.
